"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dc419663687227994b0900#post_54dc419663687227994b0900
I always love it when DMs do that because as a general rule players never ever give a shit, and when even one of them shows an interest... ah their faces light up like a kid at Christmas.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dc41ad63687218500b0700#post_54dc41ad63687218500b0700
As do I. I went through a period of unemployment and had to stop buying comics regularly and I feel almost like I abandoned something important in my life. And that thing is stories about people in tights punching each other.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dc427e636872027ab70500#post_54dc427e636872027ab70500
She finally got promoted to actually having the name Captain, So yes Carol will be Captain Marvel in the MCU and according to some will be the Superman of the verse more powerful then even Thor or Hulk, THE FUCKING HYPE!
!http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20131212210646/marveldatabase/images/2/29/Captain_Marvel_Vol_8_1_Textless.jpg!

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dc42ca6368721275820400#post_54dc42ca6368721275820400
This is true only if you don't know how to play them. I'm a veteran of many campaigns and believe me, if you don't fuck with them and actively try to pay attention to the story they're making they'll fucking love you and I guarantee that your actions will be rewarded.

I know this because I have been a DM on more than one occasion, usually in games of Vampire or Genius and a player that actually engages with you and makes your creativity feel validated will rapidly become your favorite person in the group.

We're a needy lot, by and large.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
Oh boy; incoming shitstorm!

Short version is that the FBI director after the spring of people shooting people for no god damn reason and mass protests he's going to give a speech on race relations and internal findings on February 12, 2015 (today depending on timezone).

*puts on shitstorm protection hat*

"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dc438863687227999f0900#post_54dc438863687227999f0900
I remember one time, my friend wrote up this super serious campaign. So I decided to push as many of his buttons as possible. I was playing a magic user so I kept using prestidigitation to turn everything randoms colors. I would flirt with the villains. I would flash EVERYONE. I was basically Golden Age Joker in D&D.
